thread.title: 'Naam Shabana' trailer to be out with Akshay Kumar's 'Jolly LLB 2'
thread.title_full: 'Naam Shabana' trailer to be out with Akshay Kumar's 'Jolly LLB 2' | Business Standard News

author: ANI
title: 'Naam Shabana' trailer to be out with Akshay Kumar's 'Jolly LLB 2'
text:
The trailer of 'Naam Shabana,' starring Taapsee Pannu in the lead role, is all set to be released with 'Jolly LLB 2' hitting the screens on February 10.
The 'Pink' star underwent intense training sessions for some power-packed action stunts in the movie. She plays the role of an undercover agent.
The movie is India's first spin-off based on Taapsee's character in Neeraj Pandey's film 'Baby,' a film revolving around a group of undercover agents who prevent terrorist attacks in India.
The producer of the film, Shital Bhatia said, "It's really exciting that the trailer of 'Naam Shabana' is coming out with 'Jolly LLB 2', as Akshay Kumar was in 'Baby' and 'Naam Shabana' is Baby's spin off."
It is also interesting to note that Akshay Kumar is the common factor in both movies. It will be a treat for the audience to get a double dose of the actor in the theatres as well as watching the 29-year-old actress in a totally different avatar from her previous widely appreciated film 'Pink.
